name: Flat Fat Cat Bounce
summary:
Bruno is our male cat, he wants to bring more joy and fun into his life by bouncing other flat fat cats together. Help him on his journey by crashing him, just like you would do on an air hockey or billiard table, into other fat cats.
You just need to do a swipe and see Bruno bouncing over the floor. This is not so easy however: Every room offers a diversity of obstacles: Simple furniture, chihuahua dogs, fans or color buckets which creating so much fun.
Explore Bruno's crazy adventure and experience hundreds of different levels. Master the challenges awaiting you on the hockey table!
